function.name: query_database
function.description: Query available rows that can be added to XML. Returns matching rows from the database.

limit.description: Maximum number of rows to return (default: 10)

function.name: select_rows
function.description: Select specific rows to add to the XML file. Call this when you've decided which rows to add.

row_ids.description: List of row IDs to select for adding to XML

function.name: get_row_details
function.description: Get detailed information about specific rows by their IDs.

row_ids.description: List of row IDs to get details for
